snippet: The Internet company Shazam is offering an app that will allow viewers of the Super Bowl to receive additional content on their smartphones and tablets.
abstract: The Internet company Shazam is offering an app that will allow viewers of the Super Bowl to receive additional content on their smartphones and tablets.
lead_paragraph: In another example of the growing role that screens other than TV screens will play during Super Bowl XLVI on Sunday, some blue-chip advertisers have made deals with Shazam Entertainment to offer viewers of commercials additional content through smartphones and tablets.

headline.main: Shazam Ties Into the Sounds of Super Bowl Spots
